articles.author: Rich McKay
articles.title: Overnight standoff between armed militia, police shuts down Boston-area highway - Global News
articles.description: The group, "Rise of the Moors," does not recognize American laws but professes to be peaceful.
articles.content: Eleven heavily armed, self-professed militia members were arrested near Boston Saturday, ending an overnight standoff that shut down a major U.S. Interstate at the start of the Independence holiday.… [+2020 chars]

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: France and Manchester United star Pogba joins Burna Boy's birthday celebration in Miami - Goal.com
articles.description: Lionel Messi has never succeeded in leading Argentina to a Copa America triumph although he came close on a few occasions. At age 34, this could be his last chance to do it, although Brazil, the host of the competition, will likely stand in his way.

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Freed American journalist remembers horrors of Myanmar junta jail - CNA
articles.description: FAIRFAX: Journalist Nathan Maung turned to meditation when he was jailed for reporting on Myanmar's bloody coup, but even back home in sleepy Virginia, he can't forget those left behind, including a colleague still at the mercy of their jailers.
